phrases: The city where Sensei conducted, Prague...
This year I really wanted to go to see it again...
Why do I have to be here?
Having a famous pianist for a father,
raised in a family of musicians,
since I was small I have attended stages all over the world...
and then, the conducting of Sebastiano Vieira
Soon I became engrossed in music...
Using my father's reputation I slipped into the Concert Hall
That was when Vieira-Sensei began to grow fond of me...
I was a small child but even so he taught me various things
scatologist (a person having an interest in poops)
And then, when my mother divorced my father and I had to go home to Japan with her...
Why do I have to be here?
I do not know why but he is really putting on airs!
So impressive even for Eto Sensei, who teaches only the super talented in the Piano Division, he is the most favorite.
Just a ray from his father's name!
Hey, is Chiaki-senpai going to have a lesson?
Maki-chan, let us go take a little look?
Before that Reina, Let us have lunch, lunch!
I bought special limited depachika lunch-box with 20 kinds of dishes...
Why is such a ham-looking guy going to study abroad?
What am I doing in such a place like this?
Do not get excited by yourself then give it up by yourself too!
Do you really want to do it or not, stupid!
After selecting you for the Maradona Piano Competition in December, do you intend to smear my face with mud?
Is not this your last competition in the university?
The piece is by Beethoven whom you love...
Why does a piano student like you have score sheets for Conductors?
You...do you want to be a Conductor, huh?
YOU DO NOT EVEN PLAY THE PIANO RIGHT... STUPID...
Shouting and yelling like a loan-shark demanding borrowed money!
All your students play the piano the same way!
If you admit my talent, do not teach redundant things!
Is that all you want to say?
So do not come to my lesson anymore
I will ask another student to appear in the competition
I want to be a Conductor
Although messy, it was not making a mistake
Is it true that you got dropped by Eto-sensei?
Go and apologize to Eto Sensei.
Although that Sensei is strict, he is the most talented and famous teacher in our Academy
After graduation Shinichi, you intend to go to Graduate School, right?
Just when you got a chance from him!
I do not intend to be a pianist anyway.
Then you should have gone to the Conductor Division from the start!
Even if I suddenly went to the Conductor Division, in reality it does not necessarily mean that I will get a chance to conduct.
Besides, I get to study conducting properly on my own
Furthermore, my teacher could only be Vieira-Sensei.
I do not want to be unnecessarily indebted to other people
Then you should quickly just study abroad.
To be so scared of planes that you cannot get into one...
Just having the experience of a rough emergency landing ONCE, what is the big deal?
On top of that, because of the trauma drowning in the sea, you cannot go by ship either!
Do not say it so easily!
Even if I become a professional conductor in Japan
It is no use if I cannot perform in Europe...
maybe I should just ask to be an employee in your family's company, Tagaya Music Shop
We are not in such relationship anymore.
Wherever you are, it will just be the same!
I hear the sound of the wind
This piece... is the one I heard at that time, Beethoven's Piano Sonata
Piano Sonata, which echoed beautifully within the garbage
You left it in my place this morning, right?
It is amazing that I survived in that room full of garbage.
It is not mine... that belt.
You seemed to be constricted that is why I took it off, I remember.
You mistook me for a different person
I said no it is really no.
But the smell is the same.
Lesson Instructor Change Piano Division: 4th Year Chiaki Shinichi Instructor: Eto Kozo ->
It suits well for cheering, right?
Yes the last part was good!
I seemed to have entered the wrong room
I am waiting for you, Chiaki-kun
Yaa, seeing you in person, the aura's different.
Even so, I will not let you call me Ochisen, ...
What a terrible talk, is not it!
Let us not talk while standing.
By the way, what about this belt?
Our Momogaoka Music Academy's A-Oke is an elite Orchestra consisting of the most talented students (A-Oke = A-Orchestra)
Our concert this year will have Miki Kiyora as Concert Mistress.
In the future, other gifted students will join too.
Please come to our performance next month.
I think we are almost getting there.
However from now on is the crucial moment.
Rijichou (Board Chairman), allow me to introduce...
This is Classic Life monthly magazine's Kawano-san
Hmmm... somehow there is something lacking...
It is not Classic Life, but our A-Oke
Every year, they always do the same thing, do not you think so?
But I think they have achieved a high level...
After they graduate they will most likely be succesful
However, not letting their talent fades away without any chance to grow is essentially our job.
I wish I can do something for them...
Yes, will not you try it?
Third year Noda Megumi-kun and you, Chiaki-kun, will have a two-piano lesson.
I did not know that you two know each other.
it is just right for this.
Why do I have to take lessons with such a female?
Nodame chose this one to play!
I want to do it the usual way only with Sensei...
A piano duet played by two people is very interesting.
Moreover Noda-kun's piano is very good...
No matter how good she is, it is impossible to adjust to such a person who plays so messily.
Nah, it is not impossible if it is you
Because you play the piano the best in this Music Academy
If you cannot, well what can I do...
Think of it as advising your Kohai?
Eeek, I do not know this piece.
I have never played this before either.
Although I think it will be tough to adjust to each other with this fast piece...
Well, be patient and keep practising it
Let us look at it once, then get it done and over with, Garbage Female!
For tempo it is OK to be slow, about this speed...
Do not make a mistake in just two sections!
Why does she play so sloppily?
You are not looking at the score!
What is correct with those tat-tat-tat and pat-pat-pat?
Noda-kun's ear is very good, she often learns by listening, she is not accustomed to play while looking at the scores...
So that is why she plays so messily
Well, relax and do your best
For this sort of lesson, three days is more than enough!
What shall we have for lunch?
Dumping me for such a ham!
Do people normally open the door in one swing like that?
Senpai, if you came for the belt, here it is...
Take out all your cleaning tools!
If vacum cleaner, it is always kept outside in the room.
It is on top of the bed
What is with this mountain of garbage?
I will throw them all away!
This box contains many necessary stuff like school stuff...
The box contains sweets sent from my hometown, I cannot survive without these...
Yes it was there since a year ago...
With no garbage, the sound of piano is completely different!
Ah Senpai, as a sign of my gratitude, I cooked something for you!
Salted horse mackerel with mayonnaise sauce
I was asking you what is this BLACK thing.
Do you mean to kill me?
If you say you cook by yourself, only say it after you can cook something like this!
Meringue a la penne con i broccoli.
Yummier than what my Mom cooks!
That is a bit too much...
Next time I will cook yummier stuff for you.
Rijichou, it is almost time already.
He is always loose when it comes to keeping time...
Dad, why did not you wake me up?
Have not I told you that if I do not pass today's afternoon class I will have to stay the same year?
Doing this everyday at your age!!
Just five minutes to school from here.
I wanted to let you sleep until just ten minutes before the class.
I have never eaten such delicious boiled vegetables!
Whatever dish my father cooks, it is very delicious!
(Oden = boiled fish cakes and radish etc in hot soup)
Especially boiled konbu with katsuo (boiled seaweed shining with tuna)
kotobu shining with katsura (back of head shining with wig) (he is making a pun)
Why... so you are not Japanese.
Let me tell you it is boring to tour inside a Music Academy.
A-Oke, Eto Juku, those are trivial!
Generally viewing us based only on classical music, how stupid!
Look, the whole world is rich with music...
Such... such a small practice room...
It is because you always take part-timer jobs.
Just as I thought, music is Rock!
Could it be one of my fans?
Could it be that Masumi-chan was also peeped at?
It seems that there is a strange old man walking around.
Maybe he is a stalker of Moe-san and Kaori-san...
Could it be that he is stalking Chiaki-sama?
That is Masumi-chan, is not it?
looking at Chiaki-Sama everyday for these four years.
This cheerful and suitable for a salon piece was composed in the latter part of the 18th century to be performed with an acquiantance's gifted daughter
This is the only piano duet piece that Mozart composed in his whole lifetime.
There are other pieces that are easier to do, why chose this one?
It will be tough to do it in three days as I promised.
As I thought, Noda-kun is not here yet?
She hardly arrives on time, does not she?
Well, sometimes I am also late...
Why do not you go out for a bit to drink some tea?
And I am the secondly famous Ookuchi Mamoru from Conducting Division...
For my destination I am thinking of taking lectures at Gerhalm
In that Seminar, Sebastiano Vieira will come to teach special courses, you know!
Well, in any case I will also go in the future...
I heard from Saiko-chan that Chiaki-kun and Vieira-sensei know each other?
If I meet him, I will tell him any message from you
Let us begin by ourselves first.
In that Seminar Sebastiano Vieira will come to teach special courses, you know!
If I meet him I will tell him any message from you
Wherever you are, it will be just the same!
What shall I have for dinner...
You are the earlier fantasy girl!
Shall I tell you the road where taxis usually pass?
(wrong japanese, should be could you tell me)
A road where taxis usually pass?
Oh go there, turn to the left, turn to the right!
Bitte, could you show me the way?
I was told not to follow any stranger...
I am a moral tourist from Germany (nein = no in German)
My name is Milch Holstein (Milk Cow in German)
Japan changed a lot, I do not understand anything here
I am an old man and alone...
Let us eat together with Nodame
Ah I am worried about Chiaki-senpai
Let us go and grab a meal with Senpai!
Just in time, do not you think?
This is French home-cooking, is not it?
Let us eat before they get cold.
What do you mean by sit here sit here?
Whose place do you think it is?
You have got to be robbers.
Nodame-chan, this is not your apartment?
He is not suspicious-looking, he is my friend
I met him on the street earlier...
Just met him on the steet?
Oi, just because of that he is your friend?
Oh his name is Milch... Milch Holstein-san!
He is very bright and very good at piano.
Hao, that is a very nice piano!
Oi, you sure he is not a thief?
Chiaki-kun, do you personally know him?
He is my teacher in conducting, do not you dare touch it!
You want to be a Conductor?
Nodame-chan, let us get out of here.
We seem to be bothering Chiaki-kun
In the hotel I am staying there is a good sushi restaurant
So this old man is no more than a dirty old man, eh?
Specially for today, inside my room...
I will advise you on your practice
Nodame-chan, I will teach you even more enjoyable thing...
Inside a room with a beautiful sunrise scenery...
So that is that, Ojisan, have a nice trip.
Here, I give you this coupon.
It was in the post box.
What is that iyaaa you are saying!
To bring such an immoral old man in here!
Really, I will do it properly.
Today you did not come to our practice either
Wow, it is full of checks!
that Senpai wants to be a conductor...
Nodame also wishes to see Senpai conducting soon.
What is the use of studying this... it is pointless.
However hard I study... however good I become at piano...
in the end, I am defeated even by that Ham.
Ten years ago, even until now
I can only watch orchestras from afar...
I do not want to teach you.
You do not want to practice.
Why do not we leave it at that?
From the start it is a meaningless assignment
There is no need to force ourselves to do it.
I will be the one telling Tanioka-sensei
I will say that I am unable to guide you
If it is about cleaning-up, there is still enough time...
What the heck is that'Nooo' for?
My ears ached hearing such terrible piano...
It is only been a few days, why it is already...
I cannot play the notes well yet, but I will do my best to memorize them,
I will play it well, and you listen while looking at the sheet
if you cannot learn by looking at the scores, then listen and learn with your prided ears.
It was really according to the scores!
If you are playing with me I want you to do it accurately, okay!
That is where we change places!
Your left hand is too loud!
How many times I must tell you that?!
We are not in harmony at all!
Do not do it your own way!
I do not know why I feel so upset
though I know I was not saying anything wrong
Do not get excited by yourself then give it up by yourself!
Do you really want to do it or not, stupid!
This way, I am no different from Harisen (Harisen = Eto Sensei)
The type of teaching that I abhor, is what I am exactly doing to her
Finally I did it to the last part without stumbling...
But I have washed it three days ago.
Yes, bath is every other day, shampoo is once every three days... heee
I might look dirty, but in fact I like to keep clean, do not I?
What do you mean by I might look dirty?
That is three days without shampooing!
What kind of upbringing did you receive?
Are you really okay with this?
If it is impossible,you may have a few more days
I promised to do it in three days
Eh, Noda-kun is looking at the score!
For today, you may play it as you like.
I know... she CERTAINLY has something special...
Then, who ia able to adjust to her piano is just someone like Ore-Sama!
Up to now it is a perfect unison...
The first piano is most of the time lightly playing the lead...
It showed up now... that mouth... she is starting to be out of the world...
As soon as I told her that she could do it freely, she really becomes herself...
but I will show I can keep up with her...
In fact I was constantly bothered by her piano
In the past, Vieira-Sensei once said
Since then I have been dreaming
which I gave up until last night
But now, for sure my body feels a little shiver
Is not it good Chiaki-kun, it seems that you managed to go over the wall...
So it was never about teaching a kouhai, but it was a lesson for me.
People said Mozart, the genius, composed this one-and-only piano duet piece for the sake of playing it with a gifted pupil.
However, perhaps by playing along with her he himself wanted to recall how to purely enjoy music
Looking at Senpai's back, I feel my heart thumping.
Could this be...as I thought... falling in love?
But my heart feels so tight...
Today it just happened that the music went well, but normally such playing is not allowed, ok.
If you cannot play by the score then it is out of the question to take part in competitions!
Nodame certainly will not join in any competition.
Then why did you enter Music Academy, and practise everyday?
Because Nodame wants to be a kindergarten teacher.
it seems that in Japan there is an amazing person as well
There are more things I can still do here
They said that Stresemann is coming to our school!
They said that Stresemann is coming.
That world-class Conductor who is comparable to Sebastiano Vieira?
I wonder if he will come to our A-Oke too?
Well, though for us in Piano Division, The Orchestra Divison is none of our business
Hey, he is arrived in the Teachers' Room!
Really silly people, what is so great about Stresemann coming to Conducting Division?
Incredible, just when I am about to submit my request to move to the Conducting Division.
Somehow... the eyes are a bit different...
You said you want to form a new student orchestra?
Using the students I chose, MY Oke.
But, Sensei will be looking for those in the Conductor Division and the A-Oke, right?
However, I want more students to have a chance in taking my lessons.
Please gather the students who are in these photos here.
These are my treasure photos, which I bought in Shibuya.
But this one... is from the Piano Division.
